description: Mike Ruggles is the owner and operator of the Alternative Pain Management Pu'uhonua Collective, which grows medical marijauana for a group of caregivers and patients in the Fern Acres community outside Hilo, Hawaii. (Anne M. Shearer| News 21)
This outdoor growing operation near Ruggles' home is the source of medical marijuana for the Alternative Pain Management Pu'uhonua Collective. (Anne M. Shearer | News 21)
Ruggles labels and separates his marijuana plants by strain, which have names such as Purple Rihno's(sic) and Pineapple Chunk. (Anne M. Shearer | News 21)

The Alternative Pain Management Pu'uhonua Collective has a dispensary-like operation for medical marijuana patients, which includes this display for its products within Ruggles' home near Hilo, Hawaii. (Anne M. Shearer | News 21)
